bill.summary:
Recognizes: (1) the leadership of Chef Jose Andres in founding World Central Kitchen and providing meals in multiple disaster zones, and (2) the volunteer chefs who have contributed to disaster relief efforts.
Encourages U.S. agencies involved in disaster response to incorporate World Central Kitchen best practices.
